definitions.definition: A literary or dramatic work , such as a radio or television programme, published in installments , often numbered and without a specified end.
A publication issued in successive parts, often numbered and with no predetermined end.
A serial number , esp. one required to activate software .
examples: Go to these sites for serials , cracks and keygens.

definitions.definition: A unit of police officers equipped with shields to tackle a riot .

main_definition: A literary or dramatic work , such as a radio or television programme, published in installments , often numbered and without a specified end.
secondary_definitions: A publication issued in successive parts, often numbered and with no predetermined end.
( computing , slang ) A serial number , esp. one required to activate software .
( UK ) A unit of police officers equipped with shields to tackle a riot .
